Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic

Class Game

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic.Game
public class Game extends Object
The main game class controls the game logic and elements.

  • Method Details

    • readConfigFiles

      public void readConfigFiles()
      Reads all values in the Config.properties file.

    • loadVariables

      public void loadVariables()
      Loads the game variables based on the provided settings.

    • loadLevel

      public void loadLevel(int round)
      Loads the specified level.
      Parameters:
      round - The level/round to load.

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()
      Proceeds to the next round of the game.

    • startGameLoop

      public void startGameLoop()
      Starts the game loop, updating players AbsPlayer, enemies AbsEnemy, power ups AbsPowerUp, and checking for victory or game over. If victorious, displays victory screen and plays victory sound. If game over, displays game over screen and plays game over sound.
      See Also:
      • AbsVisualManager
      • SoundSystem

    • gameLoop

      public void gameLoop()
      This method is the main game loop that runs while the game is being played. It handles updating movement, checking for collisions, and rendering the game.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game by clearing all players and objects, setting game logic booleans, and creating new players. Also loads the first level and starts the game loop.
